unnormalised: Folks in Mumbai, get ready for a blast! The "Bollywood Nights" Diwali party is happening at the Grand Imperial Hall, 12, Linking Road, Bandra (W), Mumbai - 400050 on 26/10/2024. It's gonna be a night of music, dance, and delicious food. Dress code is traditional, so dust off your best saree or sherwani!
normalised: Folks in Mumbai, get ready for a blast! The "Bollywood Nights" Diwali party is happening at the Grand Imperial Hall, twelve, Linking Road, Bandra (W), Mumbai - four hundred thousand and fifty on twenty sixth October two thousand and twenty four. It's gonna be a night of music, dance, and delicious food. Dress code is traditional, so dust off your best saree or sherwani!

unnormalised: Tickets are priced at Rs. 2500 per head and include a buffet dinner. You can grab your passes online at BookMyShow or pick them up directly from the venue's reception area, just ask for directions to "Event Registration, Ground Floor, Near the Fountain".
normalised: Tickets are priced at rupees two thousand five hundred per head and include a buffet dinner. You can grab your passes online at BookMyShow or pick them up directly from the venue's reception area, just ask for directions to "Event Registration, Ground Floor, Near the Fountain".

unnormalised: Organizers have promised a surprise celebrity guest appearance, so keep your eyes peeled! Security will be tight with guards posted at both entrances: Main Gate, 5, Linking Road Entrance, and the back entrance near, Shop No. 8, Hill Road Shops.
normalised: Organizers have promised a surprise celebrity guest appearance, so keep your eyes peeled! Security will be tight with guards posted at both entrances: Main Gate, five, Linking Road Entrance, and the back entrance near, Shop Number eight, Hill Road Shops.

unnormalised: Don’t miss out on the fun, guys! It's going to be the Diwali bash of the year and the address to remember is: Grand Imperial Hall, 12, Linking Road, Bandra (W), Mumbai - 400050. See you there!
normalised: Don’t miss out on the fun, guys! It's going to be the Diwali bash of the year and the address to remember is: Grand Imperial Hall, twelve, Linking Road, Bandra (W), Mumbai - four hundred thousand and fifty. See you there!
